definition: Tripoli, capital of Libya/Tripoli, city in north Lebanon
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
Li ethnic group of Hainan Province/surname Li/abbr. for Lebanon 黎巴嫩[Li2 ba1 nen4]
Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]

li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: Tripoli today is a tale of two cities.
sentences.chinese: 的黎波里今天上演雙城記。

sentences.english: More than 50 people in the Libyan capital Tripoli have died after drinking tainted alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 利比亞首都的黎波里50多人飲用毒酒身亡。

sentences.english: An explosion was also reported at a military base in the Tajura region east of Tripoli.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸還報告了在的黎波里以東塔朱拉地區的軍事基地。

sentences.english: The other Tripoli is one of anxiety, of fear, of heavy weapons and explosions.
sentences.chinese: 的黎波里的其他地方則是焦慮，恐懼，重武器和爆炸。

sentences.english: But at least for now the Tripolitans are not cheering all that much.
sentences.chinese: 但到現在爲止的黎波里市民還沒有肆意歡慶。

sentences.english: Bar Janvier is located about 50 kilometers west of Tripoli.
sentences.chinese: 扎維耶位於的黎波里以西約50公里處。

sentences.english: During the fighting, he published anti-Gadhafi fliers while hiding in Tripoli.
sentences.chinese: 在這次戰鬥中，他躲在的黎波里印刷反卡扎菲的傳單。

sentences.english: After Tripoli most other fronts appeared to crumble.
sentences.chinese: 在的黎波里大部分其他的前線都崩潰之後。

sentences.english: Soon, she was on her way to Tripoli.
sentences.chinese: 不久，她就在去的黎波里的途中。

sentences.english: The Neighborhood of Tajura has freed itself from Rebels. the Area of Tajura is in East of Tripoli.
sentences.chinese: 塔朱拉已經解放，塔朱拉位於的黎波里以東。

sentences.english: Missiles struck air defence sites in the capital, Tripoli, and Misrata.
sentences.chinese: 導彈擊中首都的黎波里和米斯拉塔防空網。

sentences.english: Approaching Tripoli our ships ran into a new minefield.
sentences.chinese: 在駛近的黎波里港時，我們的船隻進入一個新佈雷區。

sentences.english: It will be in the avenues and alleys of Tripoli.
sentences.chinese: 相反，它來自於的黎波里的大街小巷。

sentences.english: Another clash broke out Thursday just west of the capital in the city of Zawiya.
sentences.chinese: 星期四在位於的黎波里西部的扎維耶市也爆發了衝突。

sentences.english: The rebels were consolidating control of Tripoli, the capital.
sentences.chinese: 反對派正在鞏固對首都的黎波里的控制。

sentences.english: 'I am with you here, I am in Tripoli, ' he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，我和你們在一起，我現在就在的黎波里。

definition: Mogadishu, Indian ocean seaport and capital of Somalia
variant of 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3]/Somalia
Najaf (city in Iraq, a Shia holy city)
